Device Handling
USB Link (link)

Typedef Documentation

typedef volatile void* link_dev_t

This defines the opaque type used to select different USB Link devices.

Function Documentation

link_phy_t link_connect ( const char *  sn)

This opens a USB Link device based on the serial number.

Returns
The new device or NULL if it could not be opened
void link_del_device_list ( char *  sn_list)

This frees a list of USB Link devices (No USB transactions are performed).

Parameters
sn_listThe list to free
int link_disconnect ( link_phy_t  handle)

This closes the specified USB Link device.

Parameters
handleThe device to close
void link_exit ( void  )

This shuts down the link framework.

int link_get_err ( void  )

This function checks to see if there was an error on the last transaction.

int link_init ( void  )

This initializes the link framework. This will be called automatically by link_new_dev() if it is not called explicitly.

Returns
Zero on success.
char* link_new_device_list ( int  max)

This generates a list of available Link devices.

Returns
A pointer to the new string array.
void link_set_debug ( int  debug_level)

This function sets the debugging level for the library (0 for no debugging output).
